title: Toledo, Spain
summary: Toledo (/təˈleɪdoʊ, -ˈliːd-/ tə-LAY-doh, -⁠LEE-,[2][3] UK also /tɒˈleɪdoʊ/ tol-AY-doh,[4] Spanish: [toˈleðo] (listen)) is a city and municipality of Spain, capital of the province  of Toledo and the de jure seat of the government and parliament of the autonomous community of Castilla–La Mancha. Toledo was declared a World Heritage Site by UNESCO in 1986 for its extensive monumental and cultural heritage.
